title: Azir Exp Bug
body:
I noticed this bug while watching Bjergsen's twitch stream. When Azir's ult hits Jayce's acceleration gate, it give's him a ton of exp which causes him to level up. Please look into this, thanks.

Video proof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jny6LVNTwTk

replies.body: Thank you for the report, someone is looking into this.

Where do I complain about a dev not documenting a bug properly? (not you btw)

If I just link you to it I get modded for "spamming", so just give me an email address please, ty.
That is the most bizarre bug I've seen in a while.
It appears to have also handed him a good 150+ gold.
Similar to the old bug with Trundle and Nocturnes Q. When Nocturnes Q disappeared, Trundle would heal from his passive basically to full.

I was able to do this bug everytime, you get 20 cs if you ult right in the middle.
when i was level 14 with 32xp, i ulted and got to level 15 with about 1060xp

This bug is similar to the one Tryn had with Xerath's Q. Tryn would be able to spin through the Q charge animation (pre-rework) and gain exp/gold. It seems the abilities are somehow coded as minions basically.

If you watch the video closely you can see Azir's cs go up by about 8 when the wall hits the gate.
